Script.string: Hear me, O people of Velika!
The Scions of Lok, responsible for kidnapping, murder,
and treason beyond measure, are a thing of the past.
Defeating Lok's cult required blood and sacrifice from our bravest heroes.
The hero who led the way is among us.
On behalf of the Valkyon Federation,
I hereby give you the title "New Guardian of Velika."
Rise that we may honor you,
